column5: So who thinks Harper must go?? Ill start.  I DO!!!!  He solld out our natiral resourses with no liability to forighn investment????????????????????????  Dont think so!!!  Im not money stupid....
Layton didn't like him either. That cost the tax payers millions, Harper got majority. I saw Harpers ad on Kijiji for the "NorthWest Passage" I'm thinking of low balling him.
